subject: Gymnastics
Coaches and Managers
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The Alabama women’s gymnastics coach Sarah Patterson, who was hired by Bear Bryant in 1978 and won six national titles, is retiring because of two coming knee replacements.
snippet: The Alabama women’s gymnastics coach Sarah Patterson, who was hired by Bear Bryant in 1978 and won six national titles, is retiring because of two coming knee replacements.
